items.name: Starbucks Girl Shake
items.desc: Basic white girl? Yeah, right? You know what to do.

items.name: "I'm different" Girl Shake
items.desc: Are you not like other girls? Are you different? Let the world know by drinking this shake.

items.name: 'MURICA
items.desc: DO YOU WANT HIGH CHOLESTEROL? HOW ABOUT DIABETES? IF YOU'VE ANSWERED YES TO ANY OF THOSE, THIS IS THE MEAL FOR YOU!

items.name: "I'm on a diet"
items.desc: Want to suffer from malnutrition? Boy, do I have a meal for you.

items.name: Bodybuilder's Breakfast
items.desc: Wake up at 4 AM? No pain no gain? Is Ronnie Coleman your senpai? Egg yolk is all you've been searching for.

items.name: Elite's Breakfast
items.desc: Pan con manteca y azucar papa que mas queres, manjar de los dioses
